subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh became Heat teammates last week, unleashing a torrent of suspicion: Had they planned it all along? If so, was this illegal? The N.B.A.’s answer: probably not.
snippet: LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh became Heat teammates last week, unleashing a torrent of suspicion: Had they planned it all along? If so, was this illegal? The N.B.A.’s answer: probably not.
